description:
Choose your role between warrior, mage, cleric or rogue, and dive into a unique adventure where each character has his or her own way of solving the challenges. Discover your skills, read your options carefully and rely on your cunning to overcome each obstacle.

Every choice you make will have impactful consequences, altering the course of the story and offering you a completely personalized gameplay experience - explore multiple endings and unlock every character's story! 

Features:
- Make decisions and trust your instincts.
- Discover alternate endings.
- Every character influences the story. 
- Will you be able to discover all the endings?

Are you ready to embark on an adventure like no other? Discover your own destiny full of action and surprises!
name: Dungeon & Tales: Warriors and Dragons
